content.prompt: Which of the following could cause a movement along a country’s short-run Phillips curve toward higher unemployment and lower inflation?

choices.label: A recession in the economies of the nation’s major trading partners
A decrease in savings by the country’s consumers
A movement of the economy from the recovery phase to the expansionary phase of the business cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
